channel.title: qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix for Qubes R4 - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Automatically adding `anon-vm` tag to
Qubes ticket:
https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/3595
(Source code: https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix)
Untested.
This might work.
sudo qubes-dom0-update --enablerepo=qubes-dom0-unstable qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix

item.title: qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix for Qubes R4 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Related:

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: qubes-template-whonix-gw should depend on qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix

opened by adrelanos on 2018-05-05 
qubes-template-whonix-gw should depend on qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix?
qubes-template-whonix-ws should depend on qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix?
Where to declare such a dependency?
(T792)
Related:
#3595
https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix
https://forums.whonix.org/t/qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix-for-qubes-r4-testers-wanted
C: Whonix C: mgmt task

item.title: qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix for Qubes R4 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: no1
item.description:
According to /usr/share/doc/qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix/README,md, the template has to be given the feature whonix-ws = 1:

qvm-features whonix-ws-14 whonix-ws 1

Afterwards, new VMs based whonix-ws-14 do get the anon-vm tag and have dispvm set to whonix-ws-14-dvm.

In addition, VMs created using qvm-create get netvm set to sys-whonix. Those created from the GUI get whatever netvm was set in the GUI.

Read full topic
item.source: qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix for Qubes R4 - Testers Wanted!

item.title: qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix for Qubes R4 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: no1
item.description:
Creating a new vm using the GUI with
template := whonix-ws-14
netvm := sys-whonix (whonix 14 based)
doesn’t get the anon-vm tag applied automatically. Was that the intention / is there a specific VM creation procedure I should have followed?

Read full topic
item.source: qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix for Qubes R4 - Testers Wanted!

item.title: qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix for Qubes R4 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: troubadour
item.description:
After installing qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix, I created a new (fifth) anon VM that shows in sdwdate-gui-qubes without adding a tag in dom0. Great.

But the output of qvm-tags anon-test (latest anon-vm) is still showing only created-by-dom0.

I’m missing something.

Read full topic
item.source: qubes-core-admin-addon-whonix for Qubes R4 - Testers Wanted!
